DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate compare Bone Mineral Density ( BMD ) adolescent Depo-Provera Contraceptive Injection ( DP150CI ) user depo medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) therapy follow discontinuation DMPA . Another group elect non-hormonal contraception abstinence recruit reference population , across study site . The primary variable BMD , measure Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry ( DXA ) . Secondary variable : Total Body Composition & Total Body Calcium ( TBC ) , measure Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry ( DXA ) , surrogate biologic BMD marker . Safety evaluate adverse event reporting , laboratory evaluation , pregnancy , weight vital sign .
DOC.brief_title: Depo-Provera : Bone Mineral Density Total Body Calcium Adolescent DP150CI Users Non-Hormonal Contraception
DOC.criteria: Adolescent female menses 6 month prior enrollment Must negative pregnancy test Concomitant medication exclusion use bone modifying agent , glucocorticoid , heparin , anticonvulsant Screening Spinal BMD z score great 2 match young normal
